author: Olga Kharif
title: Gaming Services Like Twitch, Discord Are Booming
description: It’s not just Zoom. Social chat and streaming apps are seeing a surge in new users.
content: Sean Kelly was recently furloughed from a job at Formula One that had allowed him to travel frequently from San Diego to see his 12-year-old son who lives with his mother in South Carolina. With less money for plane tickets and more restrictions in place as a… [+6996 chars]
